title: Firehouse
overview: Firehouse is a half-hour series focusing on the action-packed working lives of the men of Engine Company 23, These firefighters are Captain Spike Ryerson; his second in command, Hank Myers; Sonny Caputo, the company cook; Billy Dalzell, still in his probationary year, and Cal Dakin, who is the newest fullfledged fireman. The dedicated firefighters of Engine Company 23 become involved in engrossing human drama as they go about their job saving lives and property.Â
